scripts.e2e: start-server-and-test "sh -c 'node scripts/mock-easypost.js & EASYPOST_API_URL=http://localhost:4010 EASYPOST_API_KEY=test_123 NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=http://localhost:3002 next dev --turbopack -p 3002'" http://localhost:3002 "CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:3002 cypress open --e2e"
scripts.e2e:headless: start-server-and-test "sh -c 'node scripts/mock-easypost.js & EASYPOST_API_URL=http://localhost:4010 EASYPOST_API_KEY=test_123 NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH=http://localhost:3002 next dev --turbopack -p 3002'" http://localhost:3002 "CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://localhost:3002 cypress run --e2e"
